column4: I'm looking for an HTML photo gallery generator. Synaptic throws up a few package names -- any experiences? Recommendations?
gThumb has a decent basic gallery maker
is it reasonably easy to customize the HTML templates?
I don't know, actually, I've used it once just to test
thanks, I'll have a look.
the bad thing about repeating is that it works most of the time :(
isn't English fun? :P
yes, a source of enjoyment, amusement and pleasure ;)
trademarked. Can't have copyright on a word.
right - close enough
he did
what a grateful client ;)
is that a potato variety? :)
possibly. GPL genetic engineering, of course ;)
oh, I've been pawned ;)
feisty comes with compiz, not beryl
I haven't bothered to follow the whole compiz/beryl/what's in Feisty debate - what is the System->Prefs->Desktop Effects thing?
it swaps metacity for compiz, afaik. Never worked for me
ah, ok. not actually that interested - I can live without wobbly windows and such - but I was curious what the menu option did. Nothing much, evidently.
no! How annoying...
it's minor, but irritating. My splash screen has also been replaced by a Gnome default blue one, but that I know how to fix...
